SEARCH
Package Entity

Class Request

java.lang.Object
Entity.Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
Request_ChangeSupervisor, Request_ChangeTitle, Request_DeregisterFYP, Request_RegisterFYP
public class Request extends Object
This class represents a Request object which is used to request changes to a Project's properties. The Request object stores the details of the request such as the SenderID, ReceiverID, RequestType, RequestStatus, RequestID and ProjectID.

    • Request

      public Request(String SenderID, String ReceiverID, RequestType reqType, int ProjectID)
      Constructor for creating a new Request object.
      Parameters:
      SenderID - the ID of the user who is sending the request.
      ReceiverID - the ID of the user who is receiving the request.
      reqType - the type of request being made.
      ProjectID - the ID of the project associated with the request.
